description.value: Those affected by the Warp Disruption Talent reduce their Psy Rating by 2 rather than 1. This talent can be purchased multiple times, each purchase reduces psy rating by a further 1. (EG: Warp Anathema (3) would reduce Psy rating within range by 4)
